pr_title: XRDDEV-1315 Fix router duplicate navigation console alerts

timeline.message: XRDDEV-1315 Fix router duplicate navigation console alerts

timeline.bodyText: The fix in itself is ok. I was thinking whether we should not completely swallow the expection but instead add somekind of console.log notice etc. I wonder if there could now be an endless routing loop and we wouldn't know why the app would fail?
timeline.author: TJaakkola

replies.bodyText: I added a console.log there. Now there is some clue if something weird starts happening.
replies.author: Riippi

timeline.message: XRDDEV-1315 Add a console log for duplicate navigation
